remarks: The vectors of a dual space are functionals of the original space. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2014.)
statement:
ldualvbase.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
ldualvbase.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldualvbase.v $e |- V = ( Base ` D ) $.
ldualvbase.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. X ) $.
ldualvbase $p |- ( ph -> V = F ) $.
